Title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky
Notes: The first game of the Trails sub-series and the first of the Trails in the Sky trilogy. Originally released as The Legend of Heroes VI.

Title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC
The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky the 3rd
Notes: The final part of the Trails in the Sky trilogy.

Title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero
Notes: The first part of the Crossbell arc.

Title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure
Notes: The last part of the Crossbell arc.

Title: The Legend of Nayuta: Boundless Trails
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel
Notes: The first part of the Trails of Cold Steel arc.

Title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel II
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III
The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV
Notes: The last part of the Trails of Cold Steel arc.

Title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie
Notes: The epilogue to both the Crossbell and Trails of Cold Steel arcs.

Title: The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki
Notes: The first part of the Kuro no Kiseki arc. Considered the halfway point of Trails.
